item.title: Find Rhythm. Not Momentum
item.description: [!quote] Definition - Momentum /mə(ʊ)ˈmɛntəm/ noun: momentum; plural noun: momenta PHYSICS. the quantity of motion of a moving body, measured as a product of its mass and velocity.

item.title: Language Matters!!
item.description: Because it does, and my dear friend Isabelle Pride says so. Jokes. But it really does. In the most fundamental way.

item.title: The Political Programmer
item.description: The Political Programmer Walter Benjamin’s political theory of Art and Artist on a political theory potential of ‘Open Source’ in an age dominated by ‘Big Tech.
